393640.name: Gathering Sky - Original Soundtrack
393640.description:
Music composed by Dren McDonald

The soundtrack features more than 40 minutes of original music composed and recorded exclusively for Gathering Sky. The score was recorded at the San Francisco Conservatory of Music with a small wind and string ensemble and vocalists as part of the Technology and Applied Composition program.

The soundtrack will be downloaded as high-quality MP3 files in your Steam directory:
... Steam/SteamApps/common/Gathering Sky/Gathering Sky Soundtrack/
393640.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
